message.raw:
In response to code review: run many iterations of noise and bias tests and look for statistics in the aggregate, to reduce chances of test failure.

Along the way, add in non-zero orientations, start testing orientation values, and fix bugs in the test regarding how gravity and accelerations were being examined.
